Reason

The default location of HADOOP_CONF_DIR is /etc/hadoop/conf, but Iâ€™ve downloaded hadoop directly from website, making the config file inside hadoop file, which is /usr/local/hadoop-2.6.0/etc/hadoop/.

Solution

vim hadoop-env.sh

Add this line

export HADOOP_CONF_DIR=/usr/local/hadoop-2.6.0/etc/hadoop/

I think set HADOOP_CONF_DIR in /etc/profile will also solve it.
